thread.title: Rob Gronkowski caught a beer, drank it, then spiked it
thread.title_full: Rob Gronkowski caught a beer, drank it, then spiked it

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Rob Gronkowski caught a beer, drank it, then spiked it
text:
Rob Gronkowski caught a beer, drank it, then spiked it Here we go. Post to Facebook Rob Gronkowski caught a beer, drank it, then spiked it Here we go.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/rob-gronkowski-parade-beer-new-england-patriots/   Join the Nation's Conversation   Rob Gronkowski caught a beer, drank it, then spiked it Nina Mandell , USA TODAY Sports 2:36 p.m. ET Feb. 7, 2017 82 Shares 
New England Patriots tight end Rob Gronkowski celebrates during the victory parade through the streets of Boston. (Photo: EPA) — Patriots Nation (@NEPatsNation12) February 7, 2017 
Rob Gronkowski, because he is Rob Gronkowski, chugged and spiked a beer during the Patriots parade on Tuesday - and then asked Boston one question: "Hey Boston. Who's getting wild tonight? Gronk being Gronk. pic.twitter.com/1ygOoxQfta — SI Extra Mustard (@SI_ExtraMustard) February 7, 2017 The fans called for it at the parade to rage! So guess what I had to do! Give the best fans ever what they wanted!! @ggronko @GordieGronk pic.twitter.com/y1YiqdiX8D — Rob Gronkowski (@RobGronkowski) February 7, 2017 Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/rob-gronkowski-parade-beer-new-england-patriots/ Most Popular
